description:
Available Early June:
Welcome to 2229 Saint Albans St! This gorgeous 4 bedroom / 2.5 bathroom single family home features central air conditioning, hardwood floors, laundry room, a private patio, and plenty of storage space throughout this expansive floor plan. Enter the home into the living area with the carpeted staircase straight ahead and exposed brick walls running along both walls. The large bay windows at the front encase the room in sunlight and the space flows back past the powder room and into the dining area. There are windows lining one wall and lovely white detailed paneling halfway up the other, and a lovely chandelier overhead. As you continue back through the house you step into the kitchen with tile flooring. description: Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. title: This 2 bed, 2 bath home in the heart of Queen Village
description:
This 2 bed, 2 bath home in the heart of Queen Village has the added bonus of being in the Meredith Elementary School catchment and a stone’s-throw away from the iconic Philadelphia Italian Market. In this rowhome, you will have plenty of living space, a finished basement, skylights, exposed brick, and your own private roof deck with unobstructed city views - ideal for reading, hosting family and friends, or just a quiet evening in. Enter through a lovely vestibule where you will find the living room featuring hardwood floors on the left accompanied by a coat closet and a utility closet large enough to hold bikes and strollers in the vestibule. Off the living room enter the updated eat-in kitchen with stainless steel appliances and quartz countertops. The dining area is enhanced with a large skylight, pantry, and exposed brick. A traditional staircase leads to 2 large bedrooms on the second and third levels. The second floor is home to the first bedroom which includes a built-in closet and laundry closet with washer and dryer. This floor also has a newly renovated bathroom with a tub/shower combo, rain shower head, automatic humidity sensor, a vessel sink, person in room night light and open shelving. The third floor has a large master bedroom and en-suite full bathroom with tub/shower combo and linen closet. Spacious roof deck with room to grill and grow a container garden. This home is completed with a finished basement with good ceiling height where you will find an area perfect for a den, office, entertainment or workout room with extra storage and a utility closet. Each room is outfitted with custom window shades for plenty of natural light and privacy or blackout shade for afternoon naps, wired for ethernet and enhanced with the home’s smart thermostat, video doorbell, smart deadbolt, and smart alarm system. This home is conveniently located near Whole Foods, Acme, Headhouse Square, Penns Landing, Italian Market, Optimal and Sweat Fitness, multiple yoga studios, and all the restaurants and cafes Queen Village has to offer. title: This 2 bed, 2 bath home in the heart of Queen Village
description:
This 2 bed, 2 bath home in the heart of Queen Village has the added bonus of being in the Meredith Elementary School catchment and a stone’s-throw away from the iconic Philadelphia Italian Market. In this rowhome, you will have plenty of living space, a finished basement, skylights, exposed brick, and your own private roof deck with unobstructed city views - ideal for reading, hosting family and friends, or just a quiet evening in. Enter through a lovely vestibule where you will find the living room featuring hardwood floors on the left accompanied by a coat closet and a utility closet large enough to hold bikes and strollers in the vestibule. Off the living room enter the updated eat-in kitchen with stainless steel appliances and quartz countertops. The dining area is enhanced with a large skylight, pantry, and exposed brick. A traditional staircase leads to 2 large bedrooms on the second and third levels. The second floor is home to the first bedroom which includes a built-in closet and laundry closet with washer and dryer. This floor also has a newly renovated bathroom with a tub/shower combo, rain shower head, automatic humidity sensor, a vessel sink, person in room night light and open shelving. The third floor has a large master bedroom and en-suite full bathroom with tub/shower combo and linen closet. Spacious roof deck with room to grill and grow a container garden. This home is completed with a finished basement with good ceiling height where you will find an area perfect for a den, office, entertainment or workout room with extra storage and a utility closet. Each room is outfitted with custom window shades for plenty of natural light and privacy or blackout shade for afternoon naps, wired for ethernet and enhanced with the home’s smart thermostat, video doorbell, smart deadbolt, and smart alarm system. This home is conveniently located near Whole Foods, Acme, Headhouse Square, Penns Landing, Italian Market, Optimal and Sweat Fitness, multiple yoga studios, and all the restaurants and cafes Queen Village has to offer. For our first responders and future first responders, it is walkable distance to Pennsylvania Hospital and Thomas Jefferson University Hospital. Easy access to Columbus Blvd., Market St., I-95, I-676, The Ben Franklin Bridge, subways, and less than two blocks from bus routes in any direction make this a great home for the best of city living. Walkable to many playgrounds, preschools and kid-friendly amenities. 360 virtual and in person tours are available."

$500 security deposit! Available in June, this gorgeous 1 bed/1bath condo is available for lease. Welcome to 222 Rittenhouse, an architecturally historic high-rise tower on Rittenhouse Square. Beautifully situated on the west side of the Square, 222 offers revered park side living in Center City s most sought after neighborhood at a terrific value. This handsome 1920 s building welcomes residents with a stunning double height lobby. Choose from luxury studios, one, two and three-bedroom apartments as well as penthouses in a variety of distinctive floor plans. The apartments have been recently renovated to include new kitchen cabinets, countertops, appliances, fixtures, flooring and restored tile bathrooms. Units have central air, in-unit laundry, dishwashers and great closets! Many apartments enjoy views of beautiful Rittenhouse Square and the skyline of Philadelphia. Residents enjoy 24-hour desk services, fitness facility, business lounge and 24 - hour maintenance. The biggest amenity 222 provides is the unbeatable LOCATION. A short walk to UPENN, Drexel University, Chop, Jefferson Hospital, 30th Street Station, central business district, Kimmel Center, Schuylkill River Park, high-end retail and Philadelphia's best bars, cafes, and restaurants. description:
Welcome Home to this beautiful 2 bed/1 .5 bath bi level unit with outdoor space.  Modern and clean design throughout, recessed lighting, hardwood flooring, stainless steel appliances, washer & dryer, central air & heat, video intercom for secure access, great natural light and ready for IMMEDIATE MOVE IN!  About The Neighborhood: You’ll be walking distance from the Huntingdon Station for the MFL, Temple University Hospital, and convenient shops and eateries along Lehigh Ave, such as One Pound Cheesesteak, Calypso Bar, Noodle House, Fiore Pizza, Franny Lou’s Porch, and much more! Pets are conditional on owner's approval and may require an additional pet fee, if accepted. (Generally $500/dog and $250/cat). Tenants responsible for all utilities: electricity, cable/internet, $60/mo flat water fee.
The rental requirements are as follows:
1) first, last and security to move in.
2) $45 non refundable application fee per applicant for credit and background check.
3) must be able to provide proof of income of at least three times the monthly rent.
4) 600 credit score; however if slightly below we can still accept with either a co signor or additional deposit.
5) if you have a co signor they will need to produce all the same info above which would allow you not to have to meet requirements 3 and 4.

title: Microsuite On The Mainline
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.

title: MicroSuite In Haverford
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.

description:
Available for June 1st occupancy! This gorgeous Graduate Hospital home is situated on a quiet block and features original hardwood floors throughout, and a rare first floor bedroom (optional). Walking into the home, there is a private room to the right that can act either as a third bedroom or bonus living space. Travel straight down the hallway and reach the spacious living room. The kitchen leads to a large back yard with enough space for grill, patio set, and more.
